meanings.definition: A style of beard named after the 17th-century Flemish painter Anthony van Dyck.
meanings.sent1: He decided to grow a vandyke beard to change his look.
meanings.sent2: The barber trimmed his vandyke beard neatly.
meanings.sent3: The vandyke beard made him look like a historical figure.
meanings.sent4: His vandyke beard was like a work of art on his face.
meanings.sent5: The vandyke beard added a touch of sophistication to his appearance.

meanings.definition: A decorative border or trim with a series of pointed projections.
meanings.sent1: The painting was adorned with an intricate vandyke border.
meanings.sent2: She sewed a vandyke trim along the edge of the pillow.
meanings.sent3: The vandyke border on the curtains gave the room a fancy touch.
meanings.sent4: The vandyke trim on the dress resembled tiny arrowheads.
meanings.sent5: The vandyke border added a unique flair to the design.
